replies.author: sfx160
replies.txt_content: /gamerule keepInventory true 关闭死亡掉落无需插件

replies.author: sfx160
replies.txt_content: /gamerule keepInventory true 关闭死亡掉落无需插件

/gamerule keepInventory true 指令就可以做到
你要哪个世界不掉落
就在那个世界输入一遍

replies.author: 金木研_
replies.txt_content: 死亡不掉落不需插件 只需在那个世界输入/gamerule keepinventory t  那个世界就不掉落了
